News & Events

December 26, 2023NBE held a meeting with representatives from banks, the judiciary, and the Ministry of Justice on insolvency.



December 20, 2023A delegation from NBE embarked on a key visit to Beijing, Shanghai, and Shenzhen to study from China’s journey in financial sector liberalization.



December 11, 2023NBE hosted former Prime Minister of France, Dominique de Villepin



November 29, 2023The NBE Governor provided a detailed briefing to the Parliament’s Plan, Budget, and Finance Standing Committee.



November 22, 2023The National Bank of Ethiopia hosted PM Abiy Ahmed and members of the cabinet



November 4, 2023The National Bank of Ethiopia met with Bank CEOs and Board chairs to discuss among others the NBE’s priorities outlined in its new 3-year Strategy Plan.


What is the National Bank of Ethiopia?We are Ethiopia’s Central Bank.Learn more about what we do and how we do it.


Find out about our roles and function

What is the National Bank of Ethiopia?We are Ethiopia’s central bank. We are a public body and our mission is to maintain monetary and financial stability in Ethiopia.That work includes making sure prices are stable, banking services are safe, and Ethiopia’s financial system is sound.




Does The National Bank of Ethiopia provide loan?NBE, as a central bank, does provide loan to the government and banks, not to individuals and business entities.




How do I check if my banknotes are genuine?We provide a range of free education materials about our notes and their security features. These include leaflets and posters that can be downloaded or ordered online, as well as short films and online training.




How does the National Bank of Ethiopia ensure banks are safe?We set rules for how banks should be run financially. These rules ensure banks have enough capital (money or other wealth such as property or shares) and the right plans and structures in place. We monitor banks to ensure they follow our policy. We do this by keeping in contact with bank staff at all levels so we can keep an eye on things like their accounts and the way they work. We call this work ‘supervision’.If a bank does get into difficulty, we work with it to ensure that firms have orderly wind-down plans in place. Using regulation and supervision, we try to make sure that banks are run properly, and that if a bank fails it doesn’t cause widespread problems in the economy.




What does SWIFT mean?SWIFT is a secured telecommunication system serving members and the financial community. The word SWIFT represents Society for Worldwide Inter-bank Financial Telecommunication. It is a reliable and less costly method to transfer money. All banks in Ethiopia use the system to effect monetary transaction.




Can I get a foreign currency to pay for education, subscriptions, health, etc?All eligible individuals can get foreign currency from commercial banks for these and other purposes.

/* top menu justify content */
.myTopMenu .elementor-nav-menu{
	width : 100%;
	justify-content : space-between
} 
.myTopMenu .elementor-nav-menu:after{
	content :none;
}
.columnDiv:hover  .hoverText .elementor-heading-title{
	color : var(--e-global-color-48d5cc8) !important;
}
/* myactive  */
.my_nav{
	cursor: pointer;
	text-align:left;
}
.my_nav .elementor-button-text{
	text-align:left;
}
.my_active .elementor-button{
	color :  var(--e-global-color-astglobalcolor1) !important ;
}
.gradientMenu .e--pointer-background .elementor-item-active, .gradientMenu .e--pointer-background .elementor-item.highlighted,  .gradientMenu .e--pointer-background .elementor-item:focus, .gradientMenu .e--pointer-background .elementor-item:hover{
      background: linear-gradient(45deg, #7F5523, #FCC676);

}
 .searchButton .elementor-search-form__submit{
	 background: linear-gradient(45deg, #7F5523, #FCC676);
}
/* tab hover on active tab */
.customTab .elementor-widget-n-tabs .e-n-tab-title.e-active, .elementor-widget-n-tabs .e-n-tab-title.e-active a {
	background: linear-gradient(45deg, #7F5523, #FCC676) !important;
} 

/* breadCrumbs color change  */
.breadCrumbs a{
    color : var(--ast-global-color-9);
}

/* image card sizing  */

	object-position:top;
}
/* sizing images  */
.postList .elementor-posts-container.elementor-has-item-ratio .elementor-post__thumbnail img{
	top : 0;
	transform: scale(1.01) translate(-50%, 0%);
}
/* filter grid  */
.gridCategory .premium-blog-thumbnail-container img{
	object-position : top;
}
/* quicklinks home  */
.quickLiinksHome .menu-item{
        background: #efefef;
        margin-right: 12px;
        margin-bottom: 8px;
        border-radius: 20px;
}

/* table css  */
.ExchangesContainer {
        padding: 24px 17px 28px;
        color: white;
        background: #202F3F;
        box-shadow: 12px 12px 29px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19);
        border-radius: 16px;
   
    }

    .exchangeHeaderOne {
        color: white !important;
        font-size: 24px !important;
			margin-bottom : 10px !important;
    }

    .exhangeHeaderTwo {
        color: white !important;
        opacity: 70%;
        font-size: 16px !important;
        font-weight: 400 !important;
			margin-bottom : 0px !important;
			
    }

    .exchangeHeader {
        background: #2B3948;
        box-shadow: -2px -2px 6px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
        border-radius: 8px;
        padding: 6px 13px;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    .tableRow {
        border: none !important;
    }

    .exchangeCurrencyShort {
        display: block;
        text-transform: uppercase;
    }

    .exchangeCurrencyTop {
        display: block;
    }

    .exchangeCurrencyName {
        display: block;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        padding-top: 1px;
        font-weight: 700 !important;
        font-size: 16px;
    }

    .nbeColor {
        color: #FCC776 !important;
    }

.ExchangesContainer table,
.ExchangesContainer tr,
.ExchangesContainer td {
  border: none;
}

    .ExchangesContainer tr {
        background: #2B3948;
        box-shadow: -2px -2px 6px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
        border-radius: 8px !important;
        padding: 6px 13px;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    .ExchangesContainer table {
        border-collapse: separate;
        border-spacing: 0 10px;
			margin : 0;
    }

    .ExchangesContainer td:first-child {
        border-top-left-radius: 8px;
        border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
    }

    .ExchangesContainer  td:last-child {
        border-top-right-radius: 8px;
        border-bottom-right-radius: 8px;
    }

/* Mobile Styles */
@media (max-width: 480px) {
	.ExchangesContainer {
		padding:10px;
	}
	.exchangeCurrencyName{
		font-size:14px
	}
}

      .tableExchange .tableTop {
        border-collapse: separate;
        border-radius: 10px;
        box-shadow: 0px 2.92191px 7.30479px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.09);
      }
      .tableExchange thead {
        background: var(--e-global-color-astglobalcolor0 );
      }

      .tableExchange .tableTop th {
        padding: 15px 0 15px 15px;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 22px;
      }
      .tableExchange .tableTop th:first-child {
        border-top-left-radius: 10px;
      }
      .tableExchange .tableTop th:last-child {
        border-top-right-radius: 10px;
      }

      .tableExchange .tableTop td {
        padding: 10px;
      }

      .tableExchange th {
        border: none !important;
      }
      .tableExchange th div {
        border-right: 1px solid;
        padding-right: 15px;
        width: 100%;
      }
      .tableExchange th:first-child div {
        text-align: left;
      }
      .tableExchange th:last-child div {
        border-right: none;
      }
      .tableExchange .tableTop tbody td {
        border-right: 1px solid #ccc;
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 400 !important;
        text-align: center;
      }
      .tableExchange .tableTop tbody td:first-child {
        text-align: left;
      }
      .tableExchange .tableTop tbody td span {
        font-weight: 400 !important;
      }
      .tableExchange .tableTop tbody td:last-child {
        border-right: none;
      }
      .tableExchange tbody:before {
        content: "@";
        display: block;
        line-height: 10px;
        text-indent: -99999px;
      }
      .tableExchange tbody:after {
        content: "@";
        display: block;
        line-height: 15px;
        text-indent: -99999px;
      }
      .paginationContainer {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        box-shadow: 0px 2.92191px 7.30479px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.09);

        padding: 10px 15px;
        margin-top: 15px;
        min-width: 200px;
				width : fit-content;
      }
.paginationContainer > * {
	margin : 0 5px;
}
      .paginationContainer a {
        text-decoration: none;
        color: inherit;
      }

      .tableTop {
        align-items: center;
      }
      .paginationeExchange {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
      }
      .activePage {
        background-color: var(--e-global-color-astglobalcolor0 ) !important;
        padding: 10px;
        border-radius: 3px;

      .justClicked {
        background-color: #efefef;

 .date-input {

      </td>

                       <path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                    </span>
                    <a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">
                     Does The National Bank of Ethiopia provide loan?
                    </a>
                   </div>
                   <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-1362" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="2" id="elementor-tab-content-1362" role="region">
                    <p>
                     NBE, as a central bank, does provide loan to the government and banks, not to individuals and business entities.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="elementor-accordion-item">
                   <div aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-1363" aria-expanded="false" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="3" id="elementor-tab-title-1363" role="button">
                    <span aria-hidden="true" class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right">
                     <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed">
                      <svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-plus" viewbox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                       <path d="M416 208H272V64c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32h-32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v144H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h144v144c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h32c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32V304h144c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                     <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened">
                      <svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-minus" viewbox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                       <path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                    </span>
                    <a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">
                     How do I check if my banknotes are genuine?
                    </a>
                   </div>
                   <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-1363" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="3" id="elementor-tab-content-1363" role="region">
                    <p>
                     We provide a range of free education materials about our notes and their security features. These include leaflets and posters that can be downloaded or ordered online, as well as short films and online training.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="elementor-accordion-item">
                   <div aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-1364" aria-expanded="false" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="4" id="elementor-tab-title-1364" role="button">
                    <span aria-hidden="true" class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right">
                     <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed">
                      <svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-plus" viewbox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                       <path d="M416 208H272V64c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32h-32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v144H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h144v144c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h32c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32V304h144c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                     <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened">
                      <svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-minus" viewbox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                       <path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                    </span>
                    <a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">
                     How does the National Bank of Ethiopia ensure banks are safe?
                    </a>
                   </div>
                   <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-1364" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="4" id="elementor-tab-content-1364" role="region">
                    <p>
                     We set rules for how banks should be run financially. These rules ensure banks have enough capital (money or other wealth such as property or shares) and the right plans and structures in place.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     We monitor banks to ensure they follow our policy. We do this by keeping in contact with bank staff at all levels so we can keep an eye on things like their accounts and the way they work. We call this work ‘supervision’.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     If a bank does get into difficulty, we work with it to ensure that firms have orderly wind-down plans in place.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                     Using regulation and supervision, we try to make sure that banks are run properly, and that if a bank fails it doesn’t cause widespread problems in the economy.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="elementor-accordion-item">
                   <div aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-1365" aria-expanded="false" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="5" id="elementor-tab-title-1365" role="button">
                    <span aria-hidden="true" class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right">
                     <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed">
                      <svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-plus" viewbox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                       <path d="M416 208H272V64c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32h-32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v144H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h144v144c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h32c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32V304h144c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                     <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened">
                      <svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-minus" viewbox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                       <path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                    </span>
                    <a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">
                     What does SWIFT mean?
                    </a>
                   </div>
                   <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-1365" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="5" id="elementor-tab-content-1365" role="region">
                    <p>
                     SWIFT is a secured telecommunication system serving members and the financial community. The word SWIFT represents Society for Worldwide Inter-bank Financial Telecommunication. It is a reliable and less costly method to transfer money. All banks in Ethiopia use the system to effect monetary transaction.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="elementor-accordion-item">
                   <div aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-1366" aria-expanded="false" class="elementor-tab-title" data-tab="6" id="elementor-tab-title-1366" role="button">
                    <span aria-hidden="true" class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right">
                     <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed">
                      <svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-plus" viewbox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                       <path d="M416 208H272V64c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32h-32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v144H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h144v144c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h32c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32V304h144c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                     <span class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened">
                      <svg class="e-font-icon-svg e-fas-minus" viewbox="0 0 448 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                       <path d="M416 208H32c-17.67 0-32 14.33-32 32v32c0 17.67 14.33 32 32 32h384c17.67 0 32-14.33 32-32v-32c0-17.67-14.33-32-32-32z">
                       </path>
                      </svg>
                     </span>
                    </span>
                    <a class="elementor-accordion-title" tabindex="0">
                     Can I get a foreign currency to pay for education, subscriptions, health, etc?
                    </a>
                   </div>
                   <div aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-1366" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="6" id="elementor-tab-content-1366" role="region">
                    <p>
                     All eligible individuals can get foreign currency from commercial banks for these and other purposes.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </article>
      </main>
